SEARCH
Package WATSSwingApp

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
WATSSwingApp.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
A utility class responsible for managing SQLite database operations for the Wildlife Animal Tracking System (WATS).

This class encapsulates the database file path and provides methods to establish a connection and perform CRUD operations on the WildAnimals table. It promotes modularity, reusability, and simplifies database access throughout the application.

Since:
2025-11-10
Version:
1.0
Author:
Felix Guevara

    • getAllWildAnimalRecords

      public List<WildAnimal> getAllWildAnimalRecords()
      Retrieves all wild animal records from the WildAnimals table.
      Returns:
      a List of WildAnimal objects representing all records in the database; returns an empty list if no records exist
